articles.title: Pentagon Marks 11 Military Bases as Quarantine Centers for Coronavirus
articles.description: The Pentagon has identified 11 military bases as potential quarantine centers for Americans suffering from the coronavirus, the Department of Defense (DOD) announced on Tuesday.
articles.content:
